notam.notam_html:
'FISTO' 7A/7H AND 'LACOU' 7A/7H STANDARD DEPARTURES UNUSABLE :
- IN QFU14, DEPARTURE CLEARANCES FOR FLIGHTS WITH EXIT POINT TO
'FISTO' OR 'LACOU' ARE TO BE REQUESTED ON 'BLAGNAC PREVOL' ('BLAGNAC
PREFLIGHT') FREQ 121.705MHZ. REQUESTS VIA DATALINK WILL BE REJECTED
SYSTEMATICALLY.
- THE DEPARTURE CLEARANCE WILL SPECIFY :
. FULL MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE OF THE DEPARTURE RWY, TURNING
DIRECTION AND MAG HEADING TO FOLLOW AFTER TURNING
. ALTITUDE OR FLIGHT LEVEL AUTHORISED
. SQUAWK.
- UNLESS OTHERWISE STATED BY THE ATC UNIT :
. TURBOFAN AND TURBOPROPELLER ACFT MUST PLAN A PUBLISHED
MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE WITH CLIMBING RWY CENTRELINE UP TO 4000FT
WITHOUT FORGETTING THE INDICATION OF NOT TURNING BEFORE 'TW' MAG 080
. PISTON ENGINE ACFT AND HELICOPTERS MUST PLAN A MULTIDIRECTIONAL
DEPARTURE WITH CLIMBING RWY CENTRELINE UP TO 1000FT
. TURBOPROPELLER ACFT WILLING TO USE A MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE
WITH A TURN AT 1000FT MUST REQUEST IT EXPLICITLY ON THE FREQUENCY,
BUT SUCH REQUESTS WILL NOT ALWAYS BE GRANTED
. DEPARTURES MUST COMPLY WITH OBSTACLES, ATS AND 'ENV' SLOPES. IF
NOT POSSIBLE, NOTIFY THE ATC UNIT.

notam.notam_html:
APPROACHES USE:
DEPENDING ON THE RUNWAY(S) AND TAXIWAY(S) AVAILABLE, THE
CONFIGURATION OF THE TOULOUSE-BLAGNAC HUB MAY IMPOSE CONSTRAINTS,
SUCH AS THE USE OF PROCEDURES OTHER THAN ILS, DUE TO THE POSITIONING
OF LOCALIZERS AND GLIDES. INDEED, CONTROLLERS NEED TO ENSURE THAT
ILS CRITICAL AREAS ARE FREE OF ANY MOBILE TRAFFIC, SO THAT ILS
APPROACHES CAN BE CARRIED OUT WITHOUT DISRUPTION.
FOR THESE REASONS, IF AN RNP APPROACH IS ANNOUNCED ON THE ATIS, IT
IS IMPORTANT TO COMPLY WITH IT AS FAR AS POSSIBLE, AND TO REQUEST AN
ILS APPROACH ONLY IF IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO CARRY OUT THE RNP
PROCEDURE. IN THIS CASE, WAITING TIMES MAY BE IMPOSED TO AVOID THE
DISRUPTIONS MENTIONED ABOVE.
REF AD 2 LFBO.AD 2.22

REQUESTS VIA DATALINK WILL BE REJECTED SYSTEMATICALLY. - THE DEPARTURE CLEARANCE WILL SPECIFY : . FULL MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE OF THE DEPARTURE RWY, TURNING DIRECTION AND MAG HEADING TO FOLLOW AFTER TURNING . ALTITUDE OR FLIGHT LEVEL AUTHORISED . TURBOFAN AND TURBOPROPELLER ACFT MUST PLAN A PUBLISHED MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE WITH CLIMBING RWY CENTRELINE UP TO 4000FT WITHOUT FORGETTING THE INDICATION OF NOT TURNING BEFORE 'TW' MAG 080 . PISTON ENGINE ACFT AND HELICOPTERS MUST PLAN A MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE WITH CLIMBING RWY CENTRELINE UP TO 1000FT . TURBOPROPELLER ACFT WILLING TO USE A MULTIDIRECTIONAL DEPARTURE WITH A TURN AT 1000FT MUST REQUEST IT EXPLICITLY ON THE FREQUENCY, BUT SUCH REQUESTS WILL NOT ALWAYS BE GRANTED . DEPARTURES MUST COMPLY WITH OBSTACLES, ATS AND 'ENV' SLOPES. IF NOT POSSIBLE, NOTIFY THE ATC UNIT.

notamdrec.notam_text: A0641/25 NOTAMN Q) LFBB/QPIXX/I /NBO/A /000/999/4338N00122E005 A) LFBO B) 2502101132 C) PERM E) APPROACHES USE: DEPENDING ON THE RUNWAY(S) AND TAXIWAY(S) AVAILABLE, THE CONFIGURATION OF THE TOULOUSE-BLAGNAC HUB MAY IMPOSE CONSTRAINTS, SUCH AS THE USE OF PROCEDURES OTHER THAN ILS, DUE TO THE POSITIONING OF LOCALIZERS AND GLIDES. INDEED, CONTROLLERS NEED TO ENSURE THAT ILS CRITICAL AREAS ARE FREE OF ANY MOBILE TRAFFIC, SO THAT ILS APPROACHES CAN BE CARRIED OUT WITHOUT DISRUPTION. FOR THESE REASONS, IF AN RNP APPROACH IS ANNOUNCED ON THE ATIS, IT IS IMPORTANT TO COMPLY WITH IT AS FAR AS POSSIBLE, AND TO REQUEST AN ILS APPROACH ONLY IF IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO CARRY OUT THE RNP PROCEDURE. IN THIS CASE, WAITING TIMES MAY BE IMPOSED TO AVOID THE DISRUPTIONS MENTIONED ABOVE. REF AD 2 LFBO.AD 2.22

notamdrec.notam_text: F1126/25 NOTAMR F0774/25 Q) LFXX/QXXXX/I /BO /E /000/999/4412N00040E460 A) LFBB LFEE LFFF LFMM LFRR B) 2508131006 C) 2511102359 E) DUE TO SECURITY HAZARDOUS SITUATION IN MYANMAR, FRENCH AIR CARRIERS AND CAPTAINS OF AIRCRAFT IN CHARGE OF AIR SERVICES OPERATED BY CARRIERS HOLDING AN OPERATING LICENSE ISSUED BY FRANCE, WHETHER THEY ARE CONTRACTUAL CARRIERS AND/OR OPERATING CARRIERS, OR PERFORMING AIR SERVICES THROUGH A WET LEASE OR A CODESHARE AGREEMENT AS WELL AS FOR ANY FLIGHT MADE WITH AN AIRCRAFT REGISTERED IN FRANCE ARE REQUESTED TO MAINTAIN AT ALL TIME A FLIGHT LEVEL ABOVE OR EQUAL TO FL260 IN THE AIRSPACE OF MYANMAR (FIR YANGON (VYYF) ).   IS IMPORTANT TO COMPLY WITH IT AS FAR AS POSSIBLE, AND TO REQUEST
  AN ILS APPROACH ONLY IF IT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO CARRY OUT THE RNP
  PROCEDURE. IN THIS CASE, WAITING TIMES MAY BE IMPOSED TO AVOID THE
  DISRUPTIONS MENTIONED ABOVE.

SB007/14   
  SUBJECT: AUTO COST INDEXES
  WHEN PLANNING A COST INDEX, 2 OPTIONS ARE AVAILABLE. PILOTS MAY
  EITHER SELECT A SPECIFIC COST INDEX NUMBER FROM THE LIST, OR THEY
  MAY SELECT "AUTO". WHEN PLANNING AN "AUTO" COST INDEX, THE SYSTEM
  WILL REFERENCE THE SCHEDULED "TIME ENROUTE" OPTION AND ATTEMPT TO
  CHOOSE A COST INDEX WHICH CLOSELY MATCHES THIS VALUE. NOTE THAT
  THE "TIME ENROUTE" OPTION IS MEANT AS A GATE TO GATE TIME (AS
  INDICATED ON AN AIRLINE'S FLIGHT SCHEDULE, FOR EXAMPLE). IF A
  "TIME ENROUTE" OF 2:30 IS SELECTED, THE SYSTEM WILL SUBTRACT THE
  TAXI TIMES FROM THIS VALUE TO DETERMINE THE SCHEDULED AIR TIME. IT
  WILL THEN DETERMINE AND USE THE COST INDEX WHICH MATCHES THIS AIR
  TIME.

SB003/13   
  SUBJECT: FLIGHT RELEASE UNITS
  ALL FLIGHT CREW: PLEASE PAY SPECIAL ATTENTION TO THE UNITS
  SELECTION WHEN GENERATING A FLIGHT PLAN. FAILURE TO IDENTIFY THE
  CORRECT UNITS WHEN REFUELING PRIOR TO FLIGHT CAN RESULT IN
  DEPARTING WITH INSUFFICIENT FUEL AND/OR AN ERRONEOUS PAYLOAD.
